categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Ambush of Convoy LMC-55c was an Alliance operation to capture a Lant Mining Corporation convoy. Alliance forces ambushed the convoy, which was under Imperial protection. After destroying the Imperial escort, Captain Riane of the Alliance demanded the surrender of the convoy. Captain Pricene, commander of LMC Hauler One-Six, eventually complied.
